Address.label: Address
Address.value: 501 NORTH BROADWAY,ONE FINANCIAL PLAZA, SAINT LOUIS, 63102-2188, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Stifel Financial is a middle-market-focused investment bank that produces more than 90% of its revenue in the United States. Approximately 65% of the company's net revenue is derived from its global wealth management division, which supports over 2,000 financial advisors, with the remainder coming from its institutional securities business. Stifel has a history of being an active acquirer of other financial service firms.

value.name: David D. Sliney
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Senior Vice President
